Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.nanoservice.interfaces

Interface NanoService

All Superinterfaces:
ExecutionControl
All Known Implementing Classes:
NanoServiceFactory
public interface NanoService
extends ExecutionControl

This interface describes any Nano services in the Pure Library. It supports ExecutionControl life cycle of the Nano service, deploying/undeployung pluggable processing classes into it, and get access to the static content root. Pluggable processing classes to deploy must me annotated with:

  • RootPath annotation
  • Path annotation(s)
  • FromPath annotation(s)
  • FromQuery annotation(s)
  • FromHeader annotation(s)
  • FromBody annotation(s)
  • ToHeader annotation(s)
  • ToBody annotation(s)
Since:
0.0.3
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
See Also:
NanoServiceFactory

    • deploy

      void deploy​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.Object instance2deploy) throws java.io.IOException, ContentException, SyntaxException

      Deploy processing class to the given path of Nano service. Class must be annotated with annotations were mentioned above

      Parameters:
      path - path to deploy processing class to
      instance2deploy - pluggable singleton instance to process all requests for the given path and all subpaths
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - on any I/O errors
      ContentException - on any errors in the class
      SyntaxException - on any errors in the class annotations

    • undeploy

      java.lang.Object undeploy​(java.lang.String path) throws java.io.IOException

      Undeploy processing class from the given path of Nano service

      Parameters:
      path - path to undeploy processing class from
      Returns:
      pluggable singleton instance was deployed earlier of null
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - on any I/O errors

    • getServiceRoot

      FileSystemInterface getServiceRoot()
      Returns:
      root static content or null
